thread.title: Here's the meal Guy Fieri would serve Tom Brady to cheat on his diet
thread.title_full: Here's the meal Guy Fieri would serve Tom Brady to cheat on his diet

title: Here's the meal Guy Fieri would serve Tom Brady to cheat on his diet
text:
Tom Brady’s diet is infamously restricted: It’s 80 percent vegetables and 20 percent lean meat, according to his personal chef. It does not include white sugar, white flour or caffeine.
But what if he had one day to cheat on that diet? To eat anything?
Food Network personality Guy Fieri knows what he would cook up for the Patriots’ quarterback.
“With the calories that dude burns on an average day, he definitely needs a bacon mac-n-cheese burger,” Fieri said ahead of Super Bowl LI. “It’s all about the key quality ingredients, from the homemade mac-n-cheese to the garlic butter toasted bun.”
As a riff on the 80/20 ratio of Brady’s normal regimen, Fieri would go with an 80/20 Angus beef as the base for this offering. While the four-time Super Bowl champ may normally avoid eating some of the key ingredients involved, as he seeks to extend his NFL career as long as possible, perhaps a burger is just the way to tempt him.
When Olympic gymnast Simone Biles asked the quarterback about his favorite splurge food in Houston this week, he told her it was a cheeseburger.
Maybe after a win in Super Bowl LI, Brady will call on Fieri to help him kick it up a notch.
